headline: Signs of Hope Glimmer in the Knicks’ Losses in Tinseltown
abstract: There’s Barrett and Robinson and Ntilikina and Randle. And a little less despair than usual.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — RJ Barrett, the Knicks’ 6-foot-6 teenage rookie, dribbled into the lane on Tuesday evening and confronted the Man Wall that is Lakers center Dwight Howard.
